info.title: MaterialComposition MQTT API
info.description:
Mandatory data: Battery chemistry; critical raw materials; materials used in the cathode, anode, and 
electrolyte; hazardous substances; impact of substances on the environment and on human health or 
safety

MaterialComposition.description: This channel for updating MaterialComposition Aspect.
